title: Gnome / Leprechaun Audio Pack
description: A Sample pack where developers can craft their own sounds for a  Gnome or Leprechaun-like creature
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a Gnome or a Leprechaun.

I have included Magic effects, Walking Cane, Coins, Ambience and Voice.


DEMO:

Audio Demo

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Walking Cane Sounds
  • Magic Sfx
  • Coin SFX
  • Steps
  • Vocalization


Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: (44.1 kHz / 24 bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (some of them do)

Minutes of audio provided: 5:30

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: NONE
